term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - quadrupole mass analyser
term.title: quadrupole mass analyser

item.text: An arrangement in which ions with a desired quotient mass/charge are made to describe a stable path under the effect of a static and a high-frequency electric quadrupole field, and are then detected. Ions with a different mass/charge are separated from the detected ions because of their unstable paths.
